Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet made from a red clay, well fired and with an incised band (corolla) 2 cm above the base. There are traces of throwing marks on the inside as well as the outside, on the base and of a white glaze on the lip, both inside and outside. The base is slightly annular. The walls are inverted in the upper section.
